title: Khizr Khan Received $375,000 from the Clinton Foundation
subtitle: Dubious images purport to show a bank statement proving that Khizr Khan was paid $375,000 by the Clinton Foundation after speaking at the Democratic National Convention.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Khizr Kahn's law firm received a $375,000 wire transfer from the Clinton Foundation after he spoke at the Democratic National Convention.
